{"id":716763605,"lang":"cpp","time":"2Â months","timestamp":1654628897,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/716763605/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Wildcard Matching","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int mem[2010][2010],n,m;\n    string str,pat;\n    int dp(int i,int j){\n        if(i>=n&&j>=m){\n            return 1;\n        }\n        if(i>=n||j>=m){\n            return 0;\n        }\n        if(mem[i][j]!=-1){\n            return mem[i][j];\n        }\n        int ans=0;\n        if(str[i]==pat[j]){\n            ans=dp(i+1,j+1);\n        }\n        else{\n            if(pat[j]=='*'){\n                ans|=dp(i+i,j+1);\n                ans|=dp(i+1,j);\n            }\n            else if(pat[j]=='?'){\n                ans|=dp(i+1,j+1);\n            }\n            else{\n                ans=0;\n            }\n        }\n        return mem[i][j]=ans;\n    }\n    bool isMatch(string s, string p) {\n        n=s.size();\n        m=p.size();\n        for(int i=0;i<=n;i++){\n            for(int j=0;j<=m;j++){\n                mem[i][j]=-1;\n            }\n        }\n        int ans=dp(0,0);\n        return ans>0;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"wildcard-matching"}
